media.headline: Martinez honors Taveras, Ventura
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Martinez pays tribute to Taveras, Ventura
media.bigblurb: Carlos Martinez honors Oscar Taveras and Yordano Ventura by drawing their numbers on the mound prior to the first pitch of the game

media.headline: Diaz's two stolen bases
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Diaz swipes two bags in the 3rd
media.bigblurb: Aledmys Diaz steals two bases off Jon Lester in the bottom of the 3rd inning

media.headline: Grichuk's walk-off single
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Grichuk comes through with walk-off single
media.bigblurb: Randal Grichuk lines a walk-off single to left-center field to give the Cardinals a 4-3 win on Opening Day

media.headline: Schwarber's return to left field
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Schwarber sees action in the outfield
media.bigblurb: Kyle Schwarber catches a fly ball in the bottom of the 5th inning during his first game in left field since April 2016

media.headline: Fan improvises to shield rain
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Fan uses pizza box to protect against rain
media.bigblurb: A fan puts a pizza box on the top of his head to block the rain coming down at Busch Stadium

media.headline: Cardinals, Cubs start the year
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Martinez gets season started for Cards, Cubs
media.bigblurb: Carlos Martinez delivers a ball to Kyle Schwarber for the first pitch of the season for the Cardinals and Cubs

media.headline: Martinez strikes out Bryant
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Martinez fans Bryant for first out of year
media.bigblurb: Carlos Martinez gets Kris Bryant to strike out swinging for the Cardinals' first out of the season

media.headline: Yadi's intentional walk
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Yadi draws intentional walk without pitches
media.bigblurb: Yadier Molina is the first to draw an intentional walk without a single pitch being thrown

media.headline: Lester's solid Opening Day start
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Lester fans seven over five-plus innings
media.bigblurb: Jon Lester strikes out seven Cardinals over five-plus innings of one-run ball while walking two and giving up seven hits

media.headline: Lester's first strikeout of 2017
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Lester fans Peralta for first K of year
media.bigblurb: Jon Lester gets Jhonny Peralta to strike out swinging and leave a runner stranded at third base to end the bottom of the 1st inning

media.headline: Grichuk's two-run homer
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Grichuk provides insurance with two-run jack
media.bigblurb: Randal Grichuk belts a two-run homer to right-center field in the bottom of the 8th inning to extend the Cardinals' lead to 3-0

media.headline: Manfred on the state of MLB
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Manfred on start of 2017, future of baseball
media.bigblurb: Commissioner Rob Manfred discusses the 2017 season and the exciting future for Major League Baseball and its fans

media.headline: Oh preserves lead in the 8th
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Oh retires Rizzo to escape bases-loaded jam
media.bigblurb: Seung Hwan Oh preserves the Cardinals' 1-0 lead by getting Anthony Rizzo to fly out to right with the bases loaded in the top of the 8th

media.headline: J. Martinez's double in the 9th
media.blurb: STL@CHC: J. Martinez rips a double off the wall
media.bigblurb: Jose Martinez gets himself into scoring position with a sharp double off the wall in right-center field during the bottom of the 9th

media.headline: Matheny on Cardinals battery
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Matheny on Molina's extension, Martinez
media.bigblurb: Mike Matheny discusses Yadier Molina's contract extension and the early performance of Carlos Martinez

media.headline: Cardinals legends honored
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Cardinals legends honored before game
media.bigblurb: Cardinals legends, including Bob Gibson, Joe Torre, Ozzie Smith and Jim Edmonds, are honored on Opening Day

media.headline: Martinez's 10 K's in 10 seconds
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Martinez strikes out 10 on Opening Day
media.bigblurb: Check out all 10 of Carlos Martinez's strikeouts from his dominant start on Opening Day against the Cubs

media.headline: Contreras' homer ties the game
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Contreras hammers a game-tying homer
media.bigblurb: Willson Contreras delivers a clutch three-run homer that ties the game at 3 in the top of the 9th inning

media.headline: Yadi singles after ovation
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Yadi receives ovation, singles in first AB
media.bigblurb: After signing a three-year extension with the Cardinals, Yadier Molina receives a heartfelt ovation and singles in his first at-bat

media.headline: Diaz singles in the 3rd inning
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Diaz singles on ground ball past Beaz
media.bigblurb: Aledmys Diaz singles on a ground ball that skips by Javier Baez in the bottom of the 3rd inning

media.headline: Cards introduced on Opening Day
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Cardinals greeted warmly by home fans
media.bigblurb: The Cardinals starting lineup gets a strong ovation by their fans as they are introduced on Opening Day

media.headline: Fowler on his WS experience
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Fowler talks about World Series Game 7
media.bigblurb: Dexter Fowler talks about his experiences in the World Series with the Cubs last season

media.headline: Carpenter's sac fly to right
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Carpenter opens scoring with a sac fly
media.bigblurb: Matt Carpenter lines a ball to right for a sacrifice fly to plate Dexter Fowler and give the Cardinals a 1-0 lead in the bottom of the 1st

media.headline: Edwards gets Cubs out of trouble
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Edwards escapes jam with timly double play
media.bigblurb: Carl Edwards Jr. gets Carlos Martinez to ground into a double play to end the bottom of the 6th and escape a bases-loaded jam

media.headline: Ingrid Berry sings anthem
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Chuck Berry's daughter sings national anthem
media.bigblurb: Chuck Berry's daughter, Ingrid, sings the national anthem before the Cardinals host the Cubs on Opening Day

media.headline: Heyward singles after miscue
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Heyward hustles to leg out infield single
media.bigblurb: After Matt Carpenter bobbles a ground ball, Jason Heyward hustles to earn a single in the top of the 9th inning

media.headline: Martinez's outstanding start
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Martinez dazzles over 7 1/3 dominant frames
media.bigblurb: Carlos Martinez tosses 7 1/3 innings of scoreless ball on six hits and no walks while striking out 10

media.headline: Cubs introduced in St. Louis
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Cubs are introduced at Busch Stadium
media.bigblurb: The Cubs starting lineup is announced prior to the start of their matchup on Opening Day against the Cardinals

media.headline: Fowler ruled out after challenge
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Cardinals challenge forceout in the 7th
media.bigblurb: The Cardinals challenge that Addison Russel's foot did not touch second on a forceout, but the call stands and Dexter Fowler is ruled out

media.headline: Matheny on Opening Day victory
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Matheny discusses dramatic walk-off win
media.bigblurb: Cardinals manager Mike Matheny talks about his team's dramatic Opening Day walk-off victory against the Cubs

media.headline: Statcast: Diaz's baserunning
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Statcast measures Diaz's pair of steals
media.bigblurb: Statcast shows how Aledmys Diaz's aggressive approach on the basepaths helped him steal two bases off Jon Lester

media.headline: Recap: CHC 3, STL 4
media.blurb: 4/2/17: Martinez, Grichuk lead walk-off vs. Cubs
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Carlos Martinez struck out 10 over 7 1/3, while Randal Grichuk hit a two-run homer and a walk-off RBI single in a 4-3 win

media.headline: Grichuk on walk-off winner
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Grichuk discusses notching walk-off hit
media.bigblurb: Randal Grichuk talks about his big walk-off hit against the defending World Champion Cubs on Opening Day

media.headline: 4/2/17 CG: CHC@STL
media.blurb: 4/2/17 Condensed Game: CHC@STL
media.bigblurb: 4/2/17 Condensed Game: CHC@STL
